/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/demoKinematicsGL.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demoKinematicsGL.dir/Link.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demoKinematicsGL.dir/Kinematics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demoKinematicsGL.dir/Jacobian.cpp.o  -o demoKinematicsGL -rdynamic -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_filesystem -lboost_timer -lpthread -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext
